meanings.definition: A person who works on or operates a railroad.
meanings.sent1: The railmen were busy repairing the tracks after the storm.
meanings.sent2: The railmen waved as the train passed by.
meanings.sent3: The railmen joked about racing each other on the tracks.
meanings.sent4: The railmen's dedication to their work is as strong as the steel rails they maintain.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the railmen hammering echoed through the valley.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of railmen working on the train tracks.
meanings.sent2: The railmen gathered at the station before their shift.
meanings.sent3: The railmen shared stories of their adventures on the job.
meanings.sent4: The railmen stood out against the backdrop of the train yard.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the railmen filled the air as they worked together.
